# llms.txt for TaxProExchange

# About
TaxProExchange is a discovery and connection platform for verified tax professionals (CPAs, EAs, CTEC preparers).

# Content Sources
- Blog: https://www.taxproexchange.com/ai
- Tools directory: https://www.taxproexchange.com/ai/tools
- Methodology: https://www.taxproexchange.com/ai/tools/methodology
